knimeNode.name: Fuzzy Rule Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies unknown data to a Fuzzy Rule Model.

fullDescription.intro: Applies unknown data to a Fuzzy Rule Model. The first input port contains the test data and the second contains the Fuzzy Rule Model that is applied to the data. The output data has one additional column with the predicted class attribute.
fullDescription.option: The name of the predicted column, appended at the end to the test data.

A probability between 0.0 and 1.0. Instances where activation lies above this threshold are classified with an unknown missing class. This is useful in cases where the feature space is not completely covered by rules.

ports.dataIn: Test data must have the same column names and types as the fuzzy model.
ports.dataOut: Test data with one additional column.
ports.modelIn: Fuzzy rule model used to classify test data.
